items.text_for_match: Fernandes 'hurt' Man Utd 'wanted him to go' to Saudi Manchester United captain Bruno Fernandes says it "hurt" to realise the club "wanted me to leave" when Saudi Arabia's Al-Hilal proposed a huge offer in the summer. items.ja: Amorim 'really disappointed' to draw 'fun game'
